details.title: Faahfaahinta Hantida
details.description: Noo sheeg faahfaahinta gaarka ah ee hantidaada
details.tipContent: Baadh hanti la mid ah deegaankaaga si aad u dejiso qiime tartan leh. Had iyo jeer waad beddeli kartaa qiimahaaga marka loo baahdo.

pricing.title: Deji qiimaha {{type}}
pricing.description: Qiime tartan leh si aad u hesho buukingyo badan

intro.title: Ku soo dhowow Martigelinta!
intro.description: Bilow safarkaaga martigelinta. Waxaan ku hagi doonaa tillaabooyinka si aad u liis gareyso hantidaada.
intro.benefit1: La xiriir martida adduunka oo dhan
intro.benefit2: Kasbo dakhli dheeraad ah adiga oo xukuma
intro.benefit3: Ku raaxayso buukingyo ammaan ah oo la ilaaliyo
intro.infoText: Waxaad bixin doontaa faahfaahinta hantidaada, dejin doontaa doorbidkaaga, kadibna daabici doontaa liiskaaga. Wax walba waad beddeli kartaa mar walba!

basicInfo.title: Macluumaad Aasaasi ah
basicInfo.description: Noo sheeg faahfaahinta aasaasiga ah ee hantidaada

description.title: Sharaxaada Hantida
description.description: Sharax hantidaada si martidu u fahmaan waxa ay filan karaan
description.label: Sharaxaad
description.placeholder: Sharax hantidaada, waxa ka dhigaya mid gaar ah, meelaha u dhow, iyo waxa martidu filan karaan inta ay joogaan...
description.minLengthWarning: Ugu yaraan {{min}} xaraf ayaa loo baahan yahay ({{remaining}} ayaa ka dhiman)
description.tipContent: Noqo mid faahfaahsan oo daacad ah. Sheeg astaamaha gaarka ah, meelaha u dhow, iyo faahfaahin kasta oo muhiim ah oo martidu u baahan yihiin.

amenities.title: Adeegyada
amenities.tipContent: Adeegyada waxay ka dhigaan hantidaada mid soo jiidasho leh oo soo jiidata marti badan. Door dhammaan kuwa khuseeya hantidaada.

policies.subtitle: Deji siyaasadda joojinta iyo xeerarka guriga

preferences.title: Doorbidka Martigeliyaha
preferences.subtitle: Deji waqtiga jawaabta iyo doorbidka buuking-ka

profile.title: Dhameystir Profile-kaaga
profile.subtitle: U sheeg martida wax badan naftaada iyo waxa kaa dhigaya martigeliye wanaagsan

images.title: Sawirada Hantida
images.description: Ku dar sawiro tayo sare leh si aad u muujiso hantidaada
images.tipContent: Sawirada tayo sare leh waxay ka caawiyaan martida inay si fiican u fahmaan hantidaada oo ay kordhiyaan buukingyada. Isticmaal iftiin dabiici ah oo muuji astaamaha ugu fiican.

title.title: Cinwaanka Hantida
title.description: Si hantidaada u yeelato magac xasuus leh oo sharaxaad leh
title.tipContent: Cinwaan fiican waa mid sharaxaad leh, xasuus leh, oo muujinaya waxa ka dhigaya hantidaada mid gaar ah. Ka dhig mid ka yar 32 xaraf si aad u hesho natiijooyin fiican.

tags.title: Tags Hantida
tags.description: Dooro tags-ka ugu habboon ee hantidaada

discounts.title: Dhimooyin
discounts.description: Deji dhimooyin si aad u hesho buukingyo badan

policies.title: Siyaasado
policies.description: Akhri oo habee siyaasadda joojinta iyo xeerarka guriga

hostInfo.title: Macluumaadka Martigeliyaha
hostInfo.description: Noo sheeg wax badan naftaada iyo doorbidkaaga martigelinta
hostInfo.infoContent: Noqoshada mid daahfuran oo sheegaya astaamaha amniga iyo khataraha suurtagalka ah waxay dhistaa kalsooni martida dhexdeeda waxayna xaqiijisaa u hoggaansanaanta xeerarka deegaanka.

review.title: Dib u eeg & Daabac
review.description: Ka fiirso wax walba ka hor intaadan daabicin liiskaaga

review.updateMessage: Liiskaaga hanti ayaa lagu cusbooneysiin doonaa macluumaadka cusub.
review.publishMessage: Hantidaada waxaa dib loo eegi doonaa oo la daabici doonaa 24 saacadood gudahood. Waxaad wax ka beddeli kartaa faahfaahinta mar walba kadib daabacaadda.

intro.title: Welcome to Property Listing
intro.description: We'll guide you through listing your property in just a few simple steps.
intro.benefit2: Set your own prices and house rules
intro.infoText: You can save your progress at any time and come back later. Most hosts complete their listing in under 15 minutes.

intro.description: We'll guide you through listing your property in just a few simple steps. You can save and exit at any time.
benefits: Set your own prices and house rules

propertyType.title: What type of property is this?

ENTIRE.label: Entire place
ENTIRE.description: Guests have the whole property to themselves.

PRIVATE.label: Private room

SHARED.label: Shared room

setup.title: Dejinta Martigeliyaha
setup.welcomeSubtitle: Aan kaa caawino inaad bilowdo martigelinta martida

setup.setupCompleteMessage: Dejintaada martigeliyaha waa la dhameystiray! Hadda waad bilaabi kartaa inaad aqbasho buukingyo.
setup.cancelMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad joojiso? Waxaad dhameystiri kartaa dejinta mar dambe, laakiin ma aqbali doontid buukingyo ilaa aad dhameystirto.
setup.listingsPromptMessage: Dhameystir dejintaada martigeliyaha si aad u bilowdo inaad ku darto oo aad maamusho hantidaada

setup.profilePromptMessage: Dhameystir dejintaada martigeliyaha si aad u gasho dejinta profile-kaaga martigeliyaha

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.subtitle: Set clear expectations for guests
cancellation.description: Choose a cancellation policy that works for your property. You can always change this later for individual listings.

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.subtitle: Guests can cancel up to 24 hours before check-in
flexible.details: Full refund for cancellations made 24+ hours before check-in

moderate.title: Moderate
moderate.subtitle: Guests can cancel up to 5 days before check-in
moderate.details: Full refund for cancellations made 5+ days before check-in, 50% refund for cancellations made 1-4 days before

strict.title: Strict
strict.subtitle: Guests can cancel up to 14 days before check-in
strict.details: Full refund for cancellations made 14+ days before check-in, 50% refund for cancellations made 7-13 days before

houseRules.title: House Rules
houseRules.subtitle: Set clear expectations for guests
houseRules.description: Set your default house rules. These will apply to all your listings unless you customize them individually.

smoking.title: Smoking Allowed
smoking.subtitle: Allow guests to smoke on your property

parties.title: Parties & Events Allowed
parties.subtitle: Allow guests to host parties or events

quietHours.title: Quiet Hours
quietHours.subtitle: Set quiet hours for your property

checkInPreferences.title: Check-in Preferences
checkInPreferences.description: How would you like guests to check in to your property?

selfCheckIn.title: Self Check-in
selfCheckIn.subtitle: Guests can check in without meeting you

keyPickup.title: Key Pickup Required
keyPickup.subtitle: Guests must pick up keys from a specific location

meetAndGreet.title: Meet & Greet
meetAndGreet.subtitle: You prefer to meet guests in person

defaultPolicies.title: Default Policies
defaultPolicies.subtitle: Set your default hosting policies. These will apply to all your properties unless you customize them individually.

summary.title: Policy Summary
summary.description: These policies will be applied to all your listings by default. You can customize them for individual properties later.

preferences.title: Host Preferences

bookings.errorLoadingPastBookings: Khalad ayaa dhacay buukingyada hore la soo saarayo
bookings.notFoundMessage: Faahfaahinta buuking lama soo rogi karo. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
bookings.cancelBookingMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad joojiso buuking-kan? Ficilkan lama noqon karo.
bookings.cancellationComingSoon: Astaanta joojinta dhawaan waa iman doontaa

reservation.paymentSecurity: Macluumaadka bixinta waa la xifdiyay oo ammaan ah
reservation.petsDescription: Ma rabtaa inaad keento xayawaan adeeg?
reservation.maxGuestsReached: Tirada ugu badnayd ee martida waa la gaadhay
reservation.maxInfantsReached: Tirada ugu badnayd ee dhallaan waa la gaadhay
reservation.maxPetsReached: Tirada ugu badnayd ee xayawaan waa la gaadhay

reservation.bookingDetailsDescription: Dib u eeg faahfaahinta buukingkaaga ka hor xaqiijinta
reservation.priceBreakdownDescription: Faahfaahin buuxa oo ku saabsan wadartaada

search.title: Raadi
search.clearRecentSearchesMessage: Tani waxay ka saari doontaa dhammaan baadhistaada dhawaan

search.allRecentSearchesCleared: Dhammaan baadhista dhawaan ayaa la tirtiray
search.tryAdjustingFilters: Isku day inaad habee shaandhaha baadhista

profile.personalInfoDesc: Cusboonaysii magacaaga, macluumaadka xiriirka, iyo sawirka profile-ka
profile.currencyDesc: Dooro lacagta aad rabto qiimaha iyo lacag bixinta
profile.themeDarkDesc: Isticmaal theme madow si aad u aragto si fiican iftiin yar
profile.themeLightDesc: Isticmaal theme cad si aad u aragto si fiican iftiin sare
profile.currencyChangeError: Lacagta beddelka waa fashilmay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.

currencyInfo.title: Macluumaadka Lacagta
currencyInfo.description: Doorbidkaaga lacagta waxaa la isticmaali doonaa app-ka oo dhan si loo muujiyo qiimaha iyo bixinta. Waxaad beddeli kartaa mar walba.

profile.hostModeDesc: U wareeg habka martigeliyaha iyo socotada
profile.helpCenterDesc: Hel caawimo oo hel jawaabo su'aalaha caadiga ah
profile.resetAppDesc: Xali dhibaatooyin adigoo tirtiraya xogta la keydiyay

languageInfo.title: Macluumaadka Luuqadda
languageInfo.description: Dooro luuqadda aad rabto interface-ka app-ka. Tani waxay beddeli doontaa dhammaan qoraalka iyo fariinaha luuqaddaada.

themeInfo.title: Macluumaadka Theme-ka
themeInfo.description: Dooro sida app-ka u muuqda. Nidaamka wuxuu raaci doonaa dejinta theme-ka qalabkaaga.

personalInfoForm.title: Macluumaadka Shakhsi ah
personalInfoForm.description: Cusboonaysii faahfaahinta shakhsiiga ah iyo macluumaadka xiriirka

helpCenterInfo.title: Xarunta Caawimada
helpCenterInfo.description: Hel jawaabo su'aalaha inta badan la isweydiiyo oo hel taageero isticmaalka app-ka.

feedbackInfo.title: Bixi Fikrad
feedbackInfo.description: Waxaan jeclaan lahayn inaan kaaga maqalno! La wadaag fikradaada, talooyinka, ama sheeg dhibaato kasta oo aad la kulantay.

termsInfo.title: Shuruudaha Adeegga
termsInfo.description: Akhri shuruudaha iyo xaaladaha ayaa xukumaya isticmaalkaaga app-ka.

upload.profileImageSuccess: Sawirka profile-ka si guul leh ayaa la soo dejiyay
upload.profileImageError: Sawirka profile-ka soo dejinta waa fashilmay
upload.propertyImageSuccess: Sawirada hantida si guul leh ayaa la soo dejiyay
upload.propertyImageError: Sawirada hantida soo dejinta waa fashilmay
upload.unitImageSuccess: Sawirada unugga si guul leh ayaa la soo dejiyay
upload.unitImageError: Sawirada unugga soo dejinta waa fashilmay
upload.imageTooLarge: Cabbirka sawirka waa inuu ahaadaa ka yar {{maxSize}}MB
upload.unsupportedFormat: Habka sawirka aan la taageerin. Fadlan isticmaal JPEG, PNG, ama WebP
upload.networkError: Khalad shabakad. Fadlan hubi xiriirkaaga oo dib u isku day
